page.title: 17TOURISM
page.content: Plus Pleasure Museum portrays the history of the canals and how the canal people lived and worked. Open daily from 10 am to 5.30 pm. Popular with parties of children. There is a gift shop which sells a wide range of souveniors; small gifts & sweets. Shardlow Canal & River Trips offers narrow boat trips on 'Princess' a luxury passenger boat. Seats 44 persons, fully enclosed with central heating, toilet facilities and seats. There is also a bar, serving alcoholic drinks, and tea and coffee. Afternoon and evening trips are arranged from 1 hour to 3 hours duration prices from Â£1.50 to Â£2.95.
